item.title: Jeff add a quote by John Grierson
item.description: "Art Is Not A Mirror - It Is A Hammer." -- John Grierson

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Tom McCarthy
item.description: "Literature has to remain frustrating — to withhold something, remain incomplete — or it’s not literature anymore, but rather entertainment, edification or interpretation. That’s literature’s USP: staying unresolved, keeping its most vital messages unspoken, creating a zone of noise where everything and nothing is said at the same time." -- Tom McCarthy

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "So many people can now write competent stories that the short story is in danger of dying of competence." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Alexander Theroux
item.description: "Will I have to use a dictionary to read your book?" asked Mrs. Dodypol. "It depends," says I, "how much you used the dictionary before you read it." -- Alexander Theroux

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Brian Allen Carr
item.description: "Ifs are just wishes we should keep to ourselves" -- Brian Allen Carr

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Patrick Leigh Fermor
item.description: "Paradox reconciles all contradictions." -- Patrick Leigh Fermor
